comment: /**  * Returns a snapshot of the state.  */
code: /**  * Returns a snapshot of the state.  */ @Nonnull StateSnapshot stateSnapshot().

comment: /**  * This method returns a {@link StateSnapshotKeyGroupReader} that can be used to restore the state on a  * per-key-group basis. This method tries to return a reader for the given version hint.  *  * @param readVersionHint the required version of the state to read.  * @return a reader that reads state by key-groups, for the given read version.  */
code: /**  * This method returns a {@link StateSnapshotKeyGroupReader} that can be used to restore the state on a  * per-key-group basis. This method tries to return a reader for the given version hint.  *  * @param readVersionHint the required version of the state to read.  * @return a reader that reads state by key-groups, for the given read version.  */ @Nonnull StateSnapshotKeyGroupReader keyGroupReader(int readVersionHint).
